tool_description: This API allows rapidly implement one of the most  well known and accepted KPI to measure customer satisfaction and loyalty: Net Promoter Score®, or NPS®. Create your survey templates and request them from wherever your applications are. Easily get the NPS for an Organization.  We also provide a word cloud mechanism and sentiment analysis to analyse your customers feedback! Try it . If you need an additional feature, feel free to consult us, because we are glad to serve if we can!!
name: NPS-Net Promoter Score
title: NPS-Net Promoter Score

api_list.name: Read a survey NLP
api_list.description: Get a detail of customer survey answer by its survey id (sid), and applies to the third answer (a3) the sentiment analysis feature.

api_list.name: NPS Organization
api_list.description: Get a summary of NPS calculation for a given organization. It considers the overall answers related to all templates belonging to a given organization and consolidates in a global NPS indicator. A time period is mandatory (start_date and  end_date) to narrow the results, otherwise, it will consider the last 24hs.

api_list.name: Details all templates answers
api_list.description: Get a full list of all customer survey responses for a given template, by identifying its template id (tid)

api_list.name: Details all organization surveys
api_list.description: Get a full list of all customer survey responses for a given organization, by identifying its organization id (oid)

api_list.name: NPS Template
api_list.description: Get a summary of NPS calculation for a given template. It considers the overall answers related to that template and consolidates in a global NPS indicator. A time period is mandatory (start_date and  end_date) to narrow the results, otherwise, it will consider the last 24hs.

api_list.name: Read all templates surveys
api_list.description: Get a list of all customer surveys answers related to a given template of questions (tid). In this method, you can see how each customer answered a given template of questions

api_list.name: List all NPS Organization  templates
api_list.description: Get a list of all NPS templates of a given Organization by its organization id (oid)

api_list.name: Read a survey
api_list.description: Get the details of a given customer survey by its survey id (sid)

api_list.name: Read Organization
api_list.description: Get a organization record by its organization id (oid)

api_list.name: NPS Client
api_list.description: Get a summary of NPS calculation for a given client_id. It considers the overall answers related to all survey answers belonging to a given client and consolidates in a global NPS indicator. A time period is mandatory (start_date and  end_date) to narrow the results, otherwise, it will consider the last 24hs.

api_list.name: Read NPS template
api_list.description: Get details of a given template by its template id (tid)
